name: bgsound
summary: The `<bgsound>` HTML element is deprecated. It sets up a sound file to play in the background while the page is used; use audio instead.

balance.name: balance
balance.summary: This attribute defines a number between -10,000 and +10,000 that determines how the volume will be divided between the speakers.

loop.name: loop
loop.summary: This attribute indicates the number of times a sound is to be played and either has a numeric value or the keyword infinite.

src.name: src
src.summary: This attribute specifies the URL of the sound file to be played, which must be one of the following types: .wav, .au, or .mid.

volume.name: volume
volume.summary: This attribute defines a number between -10,000 and 0 that determines the loudness of a page's background sound.
